p: ALD oxide coating was carried out using a Benchtop GESTar XT-ALD system (Arradiance, Inc). Zin oxide coating was obtained at various deposition temperatures using Diethyl Zinc (DEZ) purchased from Nanjing Ai Mou Yuan Scientific Equipment Co. Lt. and high-performance liquid chromatography grade H 2O precursors following the chemical reaction described below: Zn(CH 2 CH 3) 2 + H 2O â†’ ZnO + 2CH 3 CH 3.
